# Frequently Asked Questions

## Shipping
Q: How long does shipping take?
A: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping is 2-3 business days.

## Returns
Q: What is your return policy?
A: We accept returns within 30 days of purchase. Items must be unused and in original packaging.

## Contact
Q: How can I contact support?
A: You can reach us at support@acme.com or call 1-800-ACME-SUP during business hours (9am-5pm EST).
